cookingTips: Pat strawberries completely dry—any moisture causes chocolate to seize
Dip at optimal chocolate temperature (around 88°F) for smooth coating
Set dipped berries on parchment to cool at room temperature, not refrigerator
enrichment.coachingPrompt: The most classic chocolate-covered fruit. Success depends on completely dry berries and proper chocolate temperature. Teach the importance of working quickly and allowing proper cooling time.
